Posts.Content: Iam 39, and have had milky discharge from both nipples for almost 11 years now, ever since the bith of my son, who will be 11 in September. I have heard other women say that they have experienced the same thing. If it would put your mind at ease, go see your doctor. Good luck.
Posts.Title: symtpoms of breast cancer

Posts.Content: I don't have any lumps that I know about, but I have had clear discharge out of both breasts since the birth of my son 11 years ago. I have heard similar stories about discharege. However, if you have a lump I would definitely get a second opinion. Its better to be safe than sorry. On a good note, 8 out of 10 breast lumps are benign. If you are 29, I would not worry about it too much, but still get it checked out. Best of luck.
Posts.Title: "You're young," I am told
